author: ahkscript
description:
A collection of crypting and encoding functions from the community.

Currently included function:
- Hashing: CRC32, MD2, MD4, MD5, SHA-1, SHA-2 (SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512), HMAC (Checksums), Secure Salted (Checksums)

- Hashing (Custom): RSHash (Robert Sedgewick's string hashing algorithm)

- En-/Decryption: Caesar Cipher, RC4, Vigenère Cipher, XOR, ROT5, ROT13, ROT18, ROT47

- En-/Decryption (Custom): Div2, nnnik21, VxE (VxE-89, VxE-251)

- En-/Decoding: ASCII / Binary, Base64, Bin / Hex, Dec (2 to 36), URI/URL encode/decode

More functions are on the way!

A special thanks to: Bentschi, @AHK-just-me, @IsNull, @jNizM, @G33kDude, @joedf, @nnnik and others
name: Libcrypt.ahk
